attributes.review: As pleased as I was that the message of the app matched my fake Christian ideology — I came here to justify my racism and xenophobia — I was absolutely bamboozled by the contents of this app. I thought I could come here to support my Lord and Savior Donald Trump Supreme, but I only came across ghastly images of an orange blob. 0/10 because I am scared of the color orange.
attributes.title: I don’t need a constant reminder of what Trump looks like.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app like yesterday at 4:20PM today and I was really confused as to why I was doing this in the morning👁👄👁 but anyways, I was in my brothers room eating a salad in the kitchen when suddenly I open the app and it takes me in safari and straight to child pornography...🤢LIKE WHAT IS THAT?! but anyways don’t get this app please.
attributes.title: don’t get this app Trump supporters!

attributes.review: The app runs smoothly and works as intended. My only suggestion would be to add more ways to obtain points and more things to spend points on. Trump 2020! 🇺🇸🇺🇸
attributes.title: Great APP

attributes.review: most horrible app ever, I literally deleted right after I got it because that’s how bad it was. I never really write reviews, but I had to write this one because that’s how horrible it is. If their was a 0 stars option, then I would give it to this app. Don’t waste your time with this app. Thanks, have a nice day
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: For the Trump supporters, this app deleted all my information and other apps on my phone. While opening the app, it glitched out many times. I had to restart my phone 6 times until I gave up!!!!! The difficult and unbearable app took my credit card number as well!!!! I am VERY disappointed with this app. DO NOT INSTALL THE APP UNLESS YOU WANT TO DESROY YOUR PHONE AND BE HACKED!
attributes.title: DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP

attributes.review: Okay so this app SUCKLSKSKSKKS as a normal human being I must say this took much to long to download like honestly a whole 420 hours. Then it asked for my number like honestly Ik I’m hawt but geez Trump chill out. And! it completely hacked my TikTok making it super GliTchY😔 honestly don’t waste your time it’s a horrible app🤮 just like the President👋😌 thank you for your time -A Chaotic Bisexual👉👈💅🦋💖💜💙✨😉🥺😀
attributes.title: 🤢🥵👋🖕🦋💖🧚‍♂️✨

attributes.review: After watching my favorite video of trump molesting kids I found out that he had an app. But I was greatly disappointed since I was expecting the same content but for some reason it was all about some bs like why to vote for him. I was atleast expecting something similar for what made trump famous but I guess not.
attributes.title: #1trump supporter

attributes.review: I downloaded this a while back and forgot about it. Time comes to get more storage by deleting things, forgot about this app and I just needed a bit more storage. Guess I’ll never have those pictures of my new nephew:/
attributes.title: If you need storage, make sure you delete if you haven’t already 🥰

attributes.review: This app drained all my battery immediately and it downloaded all my passwords and photos to the Russian government within minutes. I can no longer log into Facebook or Instagram or play any games I had previously downloaded. Worst app ever I wish I could give it 0 stars.
attributes.title: Would give 0 stars if possible

attributes.review: This app is really really bad they even threaten to kill my pet hamster and put my toy cars in a fire and they  even wanted   my number and they also threatened to drown my pet fish ❤️❤️❤️❤️💞💞💞 and they even said if I don’t vote for Trump they’re going to find my address you guys I swear don’t download this app it’s horrible it is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded✨🌟🌺🌺💫💫🌠
attributes.title: It’s bad
